name: HipDealz
tag_list: travel, travels-deals, sales, deals, algorithm, dining, activities, accommodation, coupons, daily-deals, deal-aggregator
overview: HipDealz unleashes the â€œDaily Dealsâ€ beast from its â€œlocalâ€ cage, and makes it applicable for tourists, using a proprietary travel-related, deal-identification algorithm. HipDealz is a global deal aggregator that allows travelers to easily find relevant deals in their travel destinations. HipDealz collects daily deals and other offers from all over the Internet, including sites like Groupon, KGB Deals, Zozi, HomeRun, BigTip, Viator and many others. Its proprietary travel- related deal-identification algorithm then filters and orders those deals, so that the users sees only those deals that are most interesting and relevant to tourists during a visit, such as deals for restaurants, activities, accommodation and shows. The algorithm makes sure that all deals for irrelevant services like home cleaning, car washes, hair removal and pest control are eliminated. HipDealz also offers unique tools to travel blogs and websites so they can offer their users relevant daily deals and take part in the daily deals party.
